title: Tour de France prize money: Alpecin Deceuninck raking it in
content:
Philipsen's wins have harvested more than 48,000 euros for the Dutch team, while the once-mighty Soudal Quick-Step languishes at the bottom with only 3,600 euros.

Read the full article at Tour de France prize money: Alpecin Deceuninck raking it in on Velo.
author: ahood
